description: Configuration parameters for the Investments Move product

manual_entry_enabled.description: If `true`, show institutions that use the manual entry fallback flow.

masked_number_match_enabled.description: If `true`, show institutions that use the masked number match fallback flow.

stated_account_number_enabled.description: If `true`, show institutions that use the stated account number fallback flow.

rollover_401k_enabled.description: If `true`, the fee and contribution details for 401k accounts will be returned.
